name: Halcyon (itch) (Aevi)
description:
A memory of a peaceful period in the past.

A peace that you worked hard to achieve.

Yielding results that you desired.

Halcyon is a poetic game, with a meaning that is up for interpretation. What does Halcyon mean to you?

Use WASD to move, Space to jump and Left Mouse Button to shoot projectiles. 

A game by Anna Margrét ''Aevi'' Jónudóttir, and Sebastien ''Glaas'' Decuyper.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
